## isEqualDate() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Compares two given date type values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isEqualDate(target: Required<Date>, other: Required<Date>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

target


</td><td>

Required&lt;Date&gt;


</td><td>

Date


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

other


</td><td>

Required&lt;Date&gt;


</td><td>

Date


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if target.getTime() equals other.getTime()

## Remarks

Date.prototype.getTime() returns number of milliseconds.
